plays.text: Penalty to Justin Abdelkader 2  minutes for Hooking

Penalty to David Krejci 2  minutes for Tripping

Powerplay Goal Scored by Pavel Datsyuk assisted by Johan Franzen and Henrik Zetterberg
Penalty to Danny DeKeyser 2  minutes for Holding
Penalty to Loui Eriksson 2  minutes for Interference - Goalkeeper
Penalty to Johan Franzen 2  minutes for Holding
Penalty to Brendan Smith 2  minutes for Cross checking
Powerplay, 4 On 3 Goal Scored by Zdeno Chara assisted by Patrice Bergeron and Torey Krug
Penalty to Brad Marchand 2  minutes for Roughing
Even Strength Goal Scored by Milan Lucic assisted by Torey Krug
Penalty to Daniel Alfredsson 2  minutes for Tripping
Penalty to Patrice Bergeron 2  minutes for Hooking
Penalty to Brad Marchand 2  minutes for Roughing
Even Strength Goal Scored by Henrik Zetterberg assisted by Justin Abdelkader and Pavel Datsyuk
Bench penalty to Detroit Red Wings 2  minutes for Too many men/ice - bench(served by Tomas Tatar)
Empty Net Goal Scored by Jarome Iginla assisted by Milan Lucic and David Krejci
